description: AI Services monitoring dashboard for YOLO26 object detection and other AI services

options.content:
### AI Pipeline Performance Baselines

**Model Performance Targets:**
| Model | Expected Latency (P95) | GPU Utilization Target | VRAM Usage |
|-------|------------------------|------------------------|------------|
| YOLO26 | <100ms | 60-80% | ~2GB |
| Nemotron | <5s | 40-70% | ~6GB |
| CLIP | <200ms | 30-50% | ~1GB |
| Florence-2 | <500ms | 40-60% | ~2GB |

**Latency Alerts:**
- **Green (Healthy)**: Within expected range
- **Yellow (Warning)**: 2x expected latency - investigate GPU load, batch size
- **Red (Critical)**: 5x expected latency - likely GPU contention or model issues

**GPU Utilization Guidance:**
- **<30%**: Underutilized - consider increasing batch size or concurrent requests
- **60-80%**: Optimal - good balance of throughput and headroom
- **>90%**: Saturated - expect latency spikes; consider load balancing or GPU upgrade
